name: Zipline
0:
”Alexa, open Zipline”
”Alexa, start Zipline”
”Alexa, launch Zipline”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zip line
des:
Now you can HEAR your Slack messages – AND REPLY BY VOICE!

When you hear the Slack notification, just say:

 “Alexa, Zipline!”

To Use:

“Alexa, Zipline!”
 … Hear your new message.

“Alexa, Post with Zipline"
 … Post a message to any channel.

"Alexa, #channelname from Zipline"
 … Hear last message from any channel.

Powered by Voice Metrics
